mention.text: the soviet ambassador to peru made a representation to the ministry of foreign affairs of the country in connection with the fact that in the peruvian port of callao , a bomb had been planted and detonated last wednesday under a bus carrying crew members of the trawler ships `` kurasov '' and `` lazurny '' , yuriy gremitskikh , first deputy chief of the foreign ministry information directorate
